channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Stolen Forest bike always on 18th floor of Crossmount House SE5 0XB., 29th August
item.description:
There is always a stolen Forest bike on the 18th floor of Crossmount House SE5 0XB outside one of the flats. Please can this bike be taken away ASAP as is it is dangerous as well as stolen!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bowyer Street, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overhanging bushes through the railings of Dorset Road school, 29th August
item.description:

item.title: The drain in Hoddesdon Road outside the vehicle gate overflowing, 29th August
item.description:
The drain in the street outside the vehicle entrance to Lessness Heath Primary School appears to be blocked and overflows whenever it rains with water flooding onto the school site. This makes pedestrian travel dangerous for anyone using the car park. Pictures have been supplied and a video can be shared if required after the 20 minute downpour today.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3a, Hoddesdon Road, Lessness Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bin bags full of rubbish dumped on the green., 29th August
item.description:
Several bin bags have been dumped on the green and the commercial waste bins have been moved to this location this summer. Can you please ask the businesses along here to properly contain their rubbish, or provided them with bigger (but locked) bins?

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Amhurst Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Needles both sides of road, 29th August
item.description:
Usual problem of fallout from blooming cedar tree under a TPO unfortunately. I've swept out the parking bay as your trucks can't get in there due to parked cars and cleared round the road drain. You are due next Tuesday so this is just to warn you of what to expect ! Jenny Barnett

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Prince Consort Drive, Chislehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish all over the floor and driveway, 29th August
item.description:
The bin by the bus top outside my property 464 Green Lane is not being emptied regularly enough and for the third time in 4 weeks there is rubbish all over the floor and in my drive way caused by foxes reaching in and ripping food out of the bin I refuse to clean this up again and demand that this is cleared today without fail before we end up with a vermin problem.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 466, Green Lane, New Eltham, London
Report on FixMyStreet
